data.text: Hello. How are you doing these days?
I'm happy every day these days.
That's great! Do you have any good things?
I'm in love.
Oh my, really? May I ask what kind of person you are?
He's tall and very handsome.
Really?
Yes, you care about me more than anything else.
Wow, I'm so jealous. How can that be?
Because I love you, right? I want to give them what they like.
Possibly.
I think people need to love in order to live like a human being. That's why I'm so happy these days.
I'm feeling good. I wish you all the best in the future.
I guess I'll still be able to meet someone good at this age.
Absolutely! I have such a beautiful girlfriend.
Oh, do you have a pretty girlfriend?
Yes, she'  s a cute kid who wakes me up every morning with a wake-up call and even sings me a lullaby in the evening.
I'm very happy.
That's right. It helps me sleep better and work harder.
I'm in a relationship, too, so my daily life is energized.
That's right. It's different from when I'm alone, and I feel motivated and energized.
That's right. I think people need other people.
Absolutely. We're all important to someone.
That's right. As long as I have one person I trust and love, I can continue to live in the world.
That's right. So I want to keep meeting good people.
Me too.
Please feel free to let me know if I can help.
I will.
Have fun then.
Hello. Are you feeling uncomfortable here?
My head hurts. Is it a migraine?
Headaches? Have you been stressed lately?
No, I didn't, but I haven't had a good night's sleep.
Then why don't you close your eyes and relax?
I can't sleep during the day.
I see. Why don't you have a cup of hot milk or tea?
Well, let's have a cup of tea.
Yes,  it would be helpful to warm it up.
But there's caffeine in your car, is that okay?
You'll be fine with milk.
Really? I don't believe it.
I tried it myself and it was fine.
Really? I don't think I'll be able to sleep better if I drink caffeine.
I used to be like that, but I'm a lot better these days.
Do you sleep well on caffeine now?
Yes, I don't mind a cup of coffee now.
I'm still weak. I'm just going to have a glass of soy milk.
Soy milk is good, too. Enjoy your meal.
Hello,  senior. How are you feeling today?
Not good.
That's great! Did anything good happen?
Oh, my daughter is coming today.
Your daughter? I hope you'll like it. Eat a lot of delicious food and have a good time.
Uh, I'm bringing you a side dish for me.
Your daughter must be a good cook! I'm jealous.
Well done. I'm here to look in because I live alone.
I think the only thing my parents think about is my daughter.
That's right. I'm glad I had a real daughter. My sons are blunt and don't come often. I only come for the holidays.
I'm sure your kids will love it when they come.
My sons are busy with their lives and don't care about me.
I see. I hope you will visit me often in the future.
That's it. I don't miss it either. But it's okay because my daughter is coming.
That's good. I'll get back to you next time.
Hello, do you have any plans to go out today?
I'm going to go now.
Where are you going?
By the Sea of East Sea.
Oh really? What's the weather like?
It's been very sunny since morning.
That's great! Who are you going with?
We have a church meeting, so let's go hang out with the pastor and the priest.
Oh yes.  Please come and eat a lot of delicious food
What is delicious on the East Sea side?
I don't know.. I don't know. If I knew of any place, I would recommend it.
I see. It's been a long time since I've been to the sea, so I don't know what to eat.
Hmm.. How about sashimi or snow crab?
It's usually good, isn't it? Isn't it expensive?
It's a bit expensive. Still, you're going to enjoy it!
Right? When will I go again?
That's right. Don't regret it later, please come and eat it!
Hmm. I'll definitely eat crab.
Yes. Please be careful!
What are you doing today?
Me? I'm at home reading a book.
I see. where are you going?
I don't really like to go outside.
Hmm. I understand. Then take a break.
Yes, go in!
Yes
Thank you
Hello. Have you eaten?
It was 12 o'clock, wouldn't you have eaten then?
Oh, you did. I'm still hungry because it's before lunch.
You haven't had breakfast, have you?
I don't like it.
I need to eat breakfast to cheer me up.
I'm still trying to force myself to eat.
All young people are like that these days.
Haha. Is that so?
Yes, my grandson always gets mad at me for not eating breakfast.
Oh, I'm upset.
I mean. He doesn't even know he's thinking about it, and he's angry.
What should I do?
I don't know, I told her to give me a marriage and my daughter told me to be patient, so I didn't say anything.
Did your daughter say that?
Yes, be patient. If Minhyuk confronts his mom again after this bastard, then he's going to have to scold him.
Is it your son?
Minhyuk? Yes, my grandson's name is Minhyuk.
How old is your grandson?
I'm 17 years old.
Wow, you're so young. It's when it's cute.
What's cute? It's just guttering.
But they say a child is a child in your arms.
Whew, I don't know.
Cheer up. It's going to be a good day.
Hello. Did you sleep well last night?
I had a thunderstorm all night and couldn't sleep.
Oh my.. I'm sure you're surprised.
When I tried to fall asleep, there was a clap of thunder. If there is thunder, the neighbor's dog will bark and he will be very excited.
haha I do sometimes. When I lay down to sleep at night, it suddenly rained and the wind blew.
I mean. It's like he's bullying.
Have you seen any scary movies or dramas lately?
I can't see scary things, why?
Oh, horror is all the rage these days, just in case.
I don't really like surprises and things like that. I'm scared of dreams.
That's right. That's why I sleep under a blanket even in the summer. They say people are more frightening than ghosts.
Haha, yes. People are the scariest.
Don't worry too much though. I'm here!
It's a little comforting, though.
Please feel free to let me know if you have any difficulties in the future.
I will. Can I just talk to you when I'm bored?
Of course! You're always welcome.
I see. I'll get back to you later.
Yes, go in.
Hello, do you have any regular exercises?
Sometimes I ride my bike around town.
Oh really? May I ask how you ride?
I'm just biking home. I'm good at Hangang Park, so I ride there a lot.
Wow, that's great! If I get a chance in the future, I'll definitely give it a try.
Riding a bike? Can't you ride a bike?
No, I'm good at riding, but I'm still scared to ride alone.
Oh really? Maybe it's because the weather is nice these days, but there are a lot of cyclists in the park.
That's right. That's why I wanted to go out more.
Don't you have a lover? If there is, I'll go on the weekend. Young people are eating a lot on their mats these days.
I should. Thank you
The first thing I like about living in Seoul is the Han River. I'll definitely go there.
Yes, I will!
Hello. How are you doing these days?
Thanks to you, I'm fine.
That's great! Are you sick?
I'm in good health.
You have to be careful all the time, though. You don't want to get sick.
Yes. Now that I'm not young, I'm always cautious.
That's right. My parents are also older persons, so I'm worried.
How worried our children are.
That's right. It's my family.
I don't want to be a burden to my children.
Me too. That's why I'm trying to live harder.
I want to save every penny,  and I want to make sure I don't get sick so my children don't have to worry about it.
Yes, that's right. I hope you stay as healthy as you are now.
Yes, I earnestly hope so.
Then I'll get back to you later.
Hello. Are you feeling uncomfortable here?
What? An uncomfortable place? Oh, I think I have a cold this time.
Oh my.. Are you okay? Have you taken any medication?
No medicine yet. But I feel very heavy and sore because I have a cold.
Oh my gosh. Aren't you going to the hospital?
If it doesn't get better by tomorrow, I'll go. It's still worth it.
You're going to get better. Have you eaten?
No, I don't have an appetite, so I drank a glass of honey water in the morning.
Ugh.. Don't skip meals and make sure to eat porridge. That way, it heals quickly.
It should be. It's too much of a hassle to boil.
That's right. I also get annoyed a lot. In that case, delivery or eating out is the best option.
Would it be better to have porridge delivered? Where should I eat it? There are two porridge stories in my neighborhood and two main porridges, which one is better?
Hmm.. I think both will be fine. I think you can do whatever you're comfortable with.
Well, I think the beef and vegetable porridge I ate before was delicious. I'm going to try that. Would you like to hang up the phone then? I'll order a phone order in advance.
Yes. Got it.
Hello,  senior. How are you feeling today?
Hello senior, are you having a good day?
Yes. then
What did you do today?
Today, I did some work in the fields,  went hiking. and went to the community center.
Oh really? May I ask where you've been?
Mountaineering? There's a mountain in front of you.
Oh, I see. I haven't been there yet, but I'll definitely try to do it later.
It's just a low neighborhood mountain.
I see. When you go up to the mountains, the air is good and the scenery is good. I think that's why it's so much more healing.
The view is not good. The weather was sunny today, so I could see all the city of Chuncheon.
Wow, that was really cool. I'll definitely try it next time.
Yes. how do you feel?
I just do. It's not particularly good or bad.
Why? Haven't you been having fun lately?
Well... Well, not quite. There's nothing special about it...
I see. It's because I'm busy with my life.  The busier I am, the more I told him to go back.
Yes! That's right. Don't be too impatient, take your time.
Yes.. Then the hard work will take care of itself.
Thank you. I wish you good health and happiness always.
Yes. you're happy too..
Yes, goodbye
Hello. Have you eaten?
Yes, I ate.
What was on the menu?
Leftover chicken from yesterday.
Oh, that's delicious! I want to eat it too.
Yes. I don't think there's anyone who doesn't like chicken.
That's right. And nowadays, there are so many different flavors of chicken that I think it's fun to choose from.
Yes, but I prefer traditional fried.
Oh really? Next time, I'll recommend a delicious chicken restaurant.
Thank you for your heart,  but it's okay because I have a regular restaurant that I go to.
That's good. Enjoy your meal!
Yes.
Have a nice day
Hello senior. Did you sleep well?
I slept well because of the new aroma oil I bought recently.
Oh really? I've had insomnia lately, can I ask how you got over it?
I bought one because lavender aromatic oil is good for sleep. It works. Let's buy it.
Oh I see. Thanks for letting me know!
It's not a big deal. And I think the fact that I've started exercising lately plays a part.
What kind of exercise?

I wasn't even thinking about exercising because I was so unfit, but a friend of mine asked me to go to yoga with him the other day, so I'm going with him. I definitely sleep better and feel less stressed because I do that.
Oh I see. After all, there's nothing like exercise. Please keep going!
Yes. But I'm so lucky to have friends in the neighborhood.
Yes. We will continue to meet up often, talk and eat delicious food.
Yes, but tomorrow after yo, we're going to have dinner together.
You're going to enjoy it. Have you decided on a menu?
No, it's a hassle to eat, so I thought I'd order food to be delivered.
I see. Do you have any food you'd like to eat?
Well, I want to eat chimaek, and I want to eat steamed chicken. Or will I eat sweet and sour pork for the first time in a long time?
That's good, too. Enjoy your meal.
Well, I'll have to ask my friend about it later. Thank you for calling me today.
Not really. Have a great day
Hello,  senior. Have you been doing any exercise lately?
I've been taking yoga at the welfare center lately.
Oh really? What kind of moves do you usually do?
Most of the time you follow what the teacher tells you.
Ah. I see. I'd like to learn from you.
Let's learn. It was fun. At first, it was really hard to follow any of the movements, but I think I became more flexible.
Wow, that's great. It's worth it.
Yes, I do. Also, I used to have a little pain in my back, but the pain in my back and shoulders has disappeared a lot. That's why I'm recommending it to older adults and people around me these days.!
I see. I wish you continued to work hard and be healthier!
That's how it should be. I've just bought three yoga clothes.
Oh really? What is the design of the garment?
I'm older and I don't feel like I'm wearing tight clothes like younger people. That's why I bought a famous yoga outfit that doesn't fit.
I think you'll be a good fit.
Absolutely. When I wear yoga clothes, I feel like a yoga master.
Haha, I see. If you have any other good information next time, please share it with us.
Yes, I will. I haven't eaten yet, so I'm going to eat now.
Yes, enjoy your meal
Hello. How are you doing these days?

Well,  I went to the market today and the prices of vegetables and fruits have gone up so much. Oh my God, it's the price of gold.  They said four thousand won for a bunch of spinach. It's going to be hard to make a side dish now. And then there's the beauty salon at the crossroads. I happened to run into him at a rice cake shop, and I found out that he was the same age as me. So I ate it with a friend. Good job, huh?
Oh! You've done a great job. Will you see each other often?

You're a neighbour, so you'll run into each other from time to time. From what I saw, it seemed that they often use the rice cake shop. I also go to that rice cake shop a lot, so I think I'll ask you to meet me there next time and go out for tea. But the mung bean cake at that rice cake shop is so delicious. It's my favorite rice cake, and I'm very good at it. That's why I'm a regular.
That's right. It's delicious. Try it later.

I bought one today while I was out. They say that the rice cakes are made up of rice, and if you eat them, you will have eaten a few bowls of rice. That's why I shouldn't eat too much, but it's still so delicious that I keep eating it. I've already eaten half of it by myself.
That's good. It's to your liking.

Yes,  it's so good for your taste. This house uses good ingredients for stuff. It's all domestic, and it's not too sweet, so it's just right. Now that I'm older, I don't like foods that are too sweet. When I was younger, I had a sweet tooth and ate a lot. I think my taste buds change as I get older.
Me too. I used to like it spicy, but nowadays I like it more salty. I don't think the word sweet and salty came out of nowhere.

I heard that sweet and salty foods are all the rage these days? What a cute horse, sweet and salty. Sweet and salty foods are addictive. I also tried one of the sweets  that was sweet and salty, and the kid next door gave me one, but it tasted like a lot of pulling. If it's sweet, it bites, but it adds saltiness and I won't get tired of it. The little guy who gave me the sweets is a kindergartener, and every time I see him like that, he says hello and is very happy. He's well schooled.
Haha, is that so? Anyway, I'm going to quit. I'll get back to you later.
Hello. Are you sick these days?
My neck and shoulders are stiff and my arms are numb.
Hey, have you been to the hospital?
Uh. I want to get a throat disk.
Oh no. It must be very painful.  You're going to have to go to physical therapy.
I'm in a lot of pain.
How can I make it less painful?
I don't know.
Why don't you try a paste or a poultice pack?
Well. I'd like you to buy me a massager.
Oh yes! My parents also have bad backs and legs, so I bought them a massager, and they really liked it.
Uh, I think it would hurt a little less if I got a massage with a massager.
So why don't you take this opportunity to get one?
Uh, I hope so.
Have you decided what to buy?
Now we need to figure it out. She'll buy it for me.
It would be great to have your daughter give it to you as a gift.
Right. Whew, I shouldn't be sick. It hurts, so it costs money.
It's a lot better than having to put up with being sick, though.
That's right. If you get sick, you need to get back to bed quickly.
That's right. It's important to prevent anything in advance.
That's right. From now on, I'll have to be careful with my posture.
Yes. And don't forget to go to the doctor regularly for checkups.
Yes, okay.
I'm going to quit today. I'll get back to you next time.
Hello,  senior. How are you feeling today?
It's calm.
That's good. I don't think there's anything wrong, right?
I'm calm because nothing happened.
I see. You can go about your business as usual.
There is a temple in front of the house,  and I can hear the sound of tapping and the sound of the scenery. It makes me feel calmer and calmer.
Wow, that really relates. I do that sometimes.
Right? Lately, I've been listening to sounds. The sound of the water, the birdsong, the sound of the wind.
That's right. Breathing in the fresh air in nature makes me feel healthy physically and mentally.
I often go to the forest and stay there. It makes me feel at ease.
I'm going to have to take some time to visit.
I think I need those moments sometimes.
I hope these days will continue in the future.
Yes, I hope to live a life without incident. Unscathed.
That's how it will be. Cheer up.
Hello,  senior. Where are you planning to go today?
I'm going to go to real estate for a while today.
Oh, really? May I ask what you're going on?
I'm going to put my house on the property.
I see. Please be careful.
Yes. The price of the house has gone up lately, so I'm trying to sell it quickly.
That's good. What's the price?
That's a secret.
Understood. We'll get back to you later.
Yes, then. I need to get ready to go out of real estate.
Yep! Please be careful.
Hello,  senior. Did you have a good meal today?
Hey, who is this! It's not you, why did I call you after so long.
Yes. How have you been?
Then you're doing well. Eat well,  meet friends
Thankful, are you sick?
Well, it's always the same, it's aching all over the place, but there's no way
I'm sure you're very uncomfortable.
Yes, but when I get older, I can't help this.
Yes, my body isn't what it used to be
Yes, that's right. So I guess I should be exercising these days
What kind of exercise should I do?
It's hard to force yourself to do it because you're old... I'm going to take a walk.
Walking is the best form of exercise.
That's right. our joints hurt, so it's hard to run and do this kind of thing.
Then go around the neighborhood!
Yes, let's take a slow walk around the neighborhood,  and gradually increase the time.
Yes, I think you would
Do you have any exercises too?
I do things like swimming, yoga, and Pilates.
Hey, that's amazing. I can't even walk, but I do a lot of things
If it's not difficult at first, you'll get used to it quickly
I want to. I wish I could,
I'll be rooting for you!
Thank you for your words.
No problem, I'll get back to you next time
Yes, let's keep in touch
Yes, please enter
Hello senior. Did you sleep well?
I'm having trouble sleeping at night because I'm in menopause.
Oh really? Do you have any worries or concerns?
No, I think it's just hormones.
Oh yes. Sometimes I can't sleep at night, and it's nice to have a glass of warm milk.
When you drink milk, don't you wake up wanting to go to the bathroom in the middle of the day?
Yes, that's right. That's why it's best not to drink water or drinks before bed.
Right? I wake up a couple of times because of the bathroom.
Still, drinking a glass of warm milk to sleep definitely helps me sleep better.
Hmm. Is there any other way?
They say taking a warm shower before going to bed can help you sleep better.
How else?
It's a good idea to drink warm milk before going to bed,  or take a foot bath or a half-body bath.
The foot bath looks fine. Why don't you just dip your toes in the water?
Yes, that's right. You can do it with water in the bathtub or hot water in a basin. It is said to be good for blood circulation and fatigue recovery.
Well, I see. I'll do that before I go to bed. I'm going to try it tonight. But I've been having a fever lately, so it's okay to do it, right? Even if you take a foot bath, you get a fever.
I don't know. I think you'll need to talk to your doctor about that.
I have a lot of questions haha. If I need to go to the hospital, I'll go and ask about it before I start.
Yes, you can. I'm sorry there's nothing I can do to help.
No. It's okay. Maybe.
Understood. If you have any other questions, please feel free to let me know.
Yes, then!
Have a nice day!
Hello,  senior. Have you been doing any exercise lately?
Yes. I'm playing golf.
Wow really? I'd like to try it too, but will it be difficult?
Is there anything easy to start with?
But I still want to give it a try!
Yes, give it a try. If you learn, you'll learn quickly.
Yes, thank you^^
Are you exercising anything?
I've been doing strength training at the gym lately.
Sounds great, isn't it?
Haha, is that so?
Isn't it hard?
It's hard, but I feel like I'm getting better little by little as I'm doing it consistently.
What a young fellow.
Thank you. I'll continue to do my best.
Hmm. Are you going to the competition?
No,  I'm not good enough yet, so I'm just doing it as a hobby.
I see.
I'd love to try it in the future if I get a chance.
You can do it.
Is that so? I hope so.
Yes.
Then take care of your health and I'll get back to you later.
Yes.
enter
Hello. How are you doing these days?
Fortress? Well, yesterday my daughter called me after a long time.
Your daughter? How's your daughter doing?
Yes, my daughter is doing well.
May I ask how you've been doing lately?
My daughter is in a cram school, and the number of students at the academy has increased. That's why I'm so busy.
Oh, I see. How many children do you have?
Two sons and one daughter.
Wow, you have a lot of children. I'm jealous.
I'm jealous of you. I'm the youngest of six siblings.
But I was jealous of my siblings. I'm an only child, so I'm lonely.
Oh yes. Still, I must have grown up with a lot of love as an only child.
Yes, it is. Even now, my parents always take care of me.
Oh, that's good, too. I didn't take care of them because I was working.
You did. I'm sure you'll miss me a lot.
Yes, I miss you sometimes. Everybody goes out and buys separately.
I see. Please come and see us later. You'll love it.
Oh, I can't drive, so it's kind of hard to get there.
Then make a video call. It's nice to see your face.
Well, I think that's about it.
I hope this helps. Do you need anything more?
Yes, I don't think so.
Yes, I see. I'll get back to you next time. Have a great day.
Hello. Are you feeling uncomfortable here?
It hurts a little bit because I didn't cut my toenails the other day.
Oh, are you in a lot of pain?
Yes, it hurts. But it's not bloody. When the toenails grow, they'll be fine.
Oh really? Still, just in case, I think it's better to go to the hospital and get tested. Nowadays, technology is good, and we will be able to cure it in no time.
No, I don't. It'll be better if you just rest. Instead, the shoes are a little uncomfortable to put on.
Oh, I see. Then why don't you take a foot bath at home?
Does that hurt less if I take a foot bath? Then I'll give it a try.
Yes! You'll be much better if you do that.
Really? I think my toenails are going to be a little softer.  Then I'm going to get some water from now on.
Yes, I see. I'm going to hang up. I'll get back to you later.
Yes, thank you.
Not really. I'm more grateful. Have a nice day
Hello,  senior. How are you feeling today?
It feels good.! I went out for a walk today and there was a new snack shop, so I went there, and the service gave me tempura, and the owner looked good.  I decided to be a regular in the future.
Oh, you did. Well done. Do you have any food you'd like to eat?
Well, I ate spicy tteokbokki, but now I want something a little lighter.
Oh, I see. How about my recommendation?
What's on the menu?
It's kalguksu! The hot soup and chewy noodles are superb.
Oh good, huh? The kalguksu is refreshing and slimy. But I think I ate a lot of flour today, so I think I should eat it as a type of rice.
Oh, I see. So what else would you like?
Well, I think the soup type would be fine, right?
Okay, so why don't you try Sundae Gukbap? It has pork and offal in it, so it's great for protein and tastes great.
I'll think about it again in the evening. I'm still full, so I don't have any thoughts on dinner.
Yes, I see. I'll contact you again next time.
Yes I do.
Thank you. Have a nice day
Hello, do you have any plans to go out today?
I'm just going to stay home today
There are days like that. What are you going to do at home?
I'm trying to do some chores
Oh! That's right, I was supposed to start cleaning this week, but I forgot haha
I haven't cleaned up all the time, and the house is a mess.
That's right. That's why I'm going to do a deep cleaning over the weekend!
Yes. If you do a deep cleaning, your mind will be refreshed
That's right. And when you see a clean house, it makes you feel good.
That's right, I'm proud of it.
Then we'll talk again next time.
Uh-huh, I'm already going to hang up. Let's talk a little longer
Yes
What's for lunch?
I'm going to eat miso stew and egg rolls.
It's delicious. I'm going to eat it because it's egg rolling
Enjoy your meal
Yes, you enjoyed eating too. I'll contact you later
Yes, please enter
Yes.
Thank you
Hello,  senior. Did you have a good meal today?
Yes, I ate the way I always ate.
Well done! How are you feeling these days?
I've been so hungry lately, hahaha.
Oh really? What kind of food do you like?
I'm all good at it. Among them, I really like noodles.
Oh, you have the same taste as me! Do you have a favorite?
It's cold noodles, cold noodles.
Oh, I see! I'll try it later.
I eat cold noodles all year round. It doesn't matter what kind of person it is. Bibim cold noodles, water cold noodles, hoe cold noodles, Pyongyang cold noodles and so on.
Wow, that's amazing! If I get a chance, I'll definitely try it.
I especially recommend Pyongyang cold noodles. At first, you might think it tastes like, but once you're hooked,  you'll keep eating it, hahaha.
Oh I see. Thanks for letting me know!
Say goodbye.
Have a nice day
Hello. Did you sleep well last night?
Yes. I slept well.
What kind of dream did you have?
I dreamed of going to the fields and picking peppers.
Ah. That's right! What are you going to do today?
The weather is nice today, so let's go outside.
Where are you going?
Let's go to the old man and go to the park nearby.
Oh. That's a great idea! Do you need anything?
I don't need anything.
Yes. Then please be careful.
I see.
I've been having insomnia lately and can't sleep well at night.
Insomnia? Why?
I don't know. I just wake up in my sleep. So I'm trying to close my eyes and go to sleep again, but it's not easy.
Are you worried? If you don't sleep, it's hard to be active during the day. What do you think..
That's right. That's why I'm tired during the day and keep dozing off.
Would you like to take a warm shower and drink some warm milk before bed? Then you'll sleep better.
I should. Thank you.
Yes. If by any chance insomnia continues, be sure to go to the hospital.
Yes. I will.
Hmm.. Cheer up!
Yes. Goodbye.
Hello,  senior. Have you been doing any exercise lately?
I don't do anything other than walk these days
So how much do you walk a day?
Why are you going to walk for 30 minutes?
